name: Word Attack (joshjewell29)
description:
1.  Click on the tiles in order to make a word. Clicking the last letter a second time will play it. The tiles must be touching on the sides or corners.
  2. Each word that is 3 or more letters long will drop bricks on the opponent. They will have to play a word around this to break it apart.
  3. If the opponents board overflows for too long, you win!
  4. Get points with each word to perform a powerful special! Click the bar to use it.
  5. Running low on tiles? Click the bottom row to get more.

Need to follow a special link to log in through google, Can access from this website: (includes instructions)

https://word-attack.xsollasitebuilder.com/

Or Directly from this link:

https://login.xsolla.com/api/oauth2/social/google/login_redirect?client_id=4143&...
